SIFG.AS.summary: Sif Holding N.V. manufactures and sells steel tubulars for the offshore wind, and oil and gas markets in the Netherlands and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Wind, Oil and Gas, Marshalling, and Other. It engages in the production and delivery of monopiles, piles for jackets, tubulars, and suction based foundations; and anchor/mooring piles, cladded structures, cones, bracings, pile sleeves, pin piles, and internal ring stiffeners, as well as jack-up, jacket, and launch legs. The company rents logistical area and facilities; and delivers logistical services to the offshore wind industry. It serves energy companies, developers, and fabricators, as well as engineering, procurement, construction, and installation contractors. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Roermond, the Netherlands.
